input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item features and item specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item specification:
Light Up Child Mickey Mouse Disney Child Gloves

Item features:
Product Includes: One pair of light up gloves
Mickey Mouse (Disney)
Officially Licensed Product
input_text.Response A: Mickey Mouse gloves that light up!  It's officially licensed by Disney and includes one pair of gloves.  They light up!
input_text.Response B: These gloves are super cool and will make any kid feel like a superhero! They feature Mickey Mouse, one of the most beloved Disney characters, and are officially licensed by Disney. The gloves light up with a magical glow that will bring joy to any child. They are perfect for Halloween, Christmas and any other celebration. Your child will love showing off their new gloves and will never want to take them off!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
